title: 中文 minecraftwiki 管理员 竞选
author: Edenapple
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Edenapple 于 2011-7-22 13:07 编辑 

While you have translated a large number of pages, the primary requirement for getting a Chinese language subdomain has not been completed as of yet. Please get the Main page Minecraft Wiki/ch translated, and also determine who is going to be your admin team. Edenapple will be the primary administrator of the Chinese language wiki, however I need at least 2 other users ready to fill the role as well. Thanks for all your hard work to date! -- Wynthyst  talk 05:29, 27 June 2011 (UTC)

我们需要至少2个除了我的管理员。

候选人列表：
Celerycoloured 10:31, 9 March 2011 (UTC)Groshi 16:16, 9 March 2011 (UTC)Tyteen4a03 15:13, 9 March 2011 (UTC)Zhongguo 16:31, 13 April 2011 (UTC)wiike 16:49, 19 April 2011 (UTC)darkdukey 20:58, 19 April 2011 (UTC)Lain 20:59, 19 April 2011 (UTC)kkingoo9 19:55, 20 April 2011 (UTC)Fortomxq 20:18, 20 April 2011 (UTC)zyd232 20:23, 20 April 2011 (UTC)Hammer 17:48, 25 April 2011 (UTC+8)Rozx 01:20, 21 April 2011 (UTC)Fiona 18:06, 21 April 2011 (UTC)Zephyrus 10:03, 22 April 2011 (UTC)Geilian 12:11, 22 April 2011 (UTC)Papermoon 00:20, 28 April 2011 (UTC)Pielogist 23:04, 27 April 2011 (UTC+8)ReVanTis 11:53, 29 April 2011 (UTC+8)jarv 13:21, 30 April 2011 (UTC+8)Hzy980512 14:30, 1 May 2011 (UTC)Craft Lawrence 20:00, 2 May 2011 (UTC/GMT -4 )SleepyPrince 16:57, 3 May 2011 (UTC)UnluckyNinja 21:25, 5 May 2011 (UTC+8)eisenwater 14:13, 20 May 2011 (UTC)Assisstion 19:08, 24 May 2011 (UTC+8)Chery 21:01, 25 May 2011 (UTC+8)katetem 9:35, 29 May 2011 (UTC+8)pathfinder 21:37, 29 May 2011 (UTC+8)rongeclosion 11:43, 30 May 2011 (UTC+8)jzys 19:36, 13 June 2011 (UTC-8)Rapture 15:38, 22 June 2011 (UTC+8)troilus 20:03, 5 July 2011 (UTC+8)Hong 9:09, 22 July 2011 (UTC)

replies.author: Craft_Lawrence
replies.txt_content:
我现在在加拿大，而且已经翻译了不少词条了……wiki的用户名和我的用户名是一样的。
wiki的主页面也是我翻译的，能不能算我一个？

replies.author: Edenapple
replies.txt_content: you are already on the list

replies.author: Craft_Lawrence
replies.txt_content:
Edenapple 发表于 2011-8-1 10:31 
you are already on the list
Hi Edenapple, 
      First of all, I'm honestly impressed that you put so much effort in getting us the Chinese subdomain, your persuading spirit is truly remarkable. We appreciate everything that you have done for the Chinese MinecrarftWiki so far.
      I read the little talk between you and Wynthyst, It seems that you've mentioned several names of the candidates that you found maybe suitable for this position, including Papermoon. Well, he told me that that he's already been preoccupied by the admin work of MCBBS, so don't bother considering him.
      On the other hand, I found myself a little bit interested in this admin issue, would you mind explaining how does this admin-chosing thing work for me? Thanks a lot.
                                                                                           
                                                                 Yours sincerely,
                                                                 [[User:Craft Lawrence|Craft Lawrence]]
